name: Futureswap
highlight: Futureswap, a decentralized, permissionless, AMM-based leveraged trading protocol offers trading on Avalanche through the Trader Joe AMM.
summary: Futureswap, the first decentralized, AMM-based trading protocol that aims to offer leverage on any AMM-backed pair, now expands the exchangeâ€™s presence with version 4.1 onto Avalanche using the Trader Joe AMM with the JOE-USDC pair, allowing traders to earn $FST and $AVAX rewards simultaneously. Starting with $JOE, Futureswap is working to onboard new pairs from the Avalanche network, while staying composable and permissionless.
